name: The Village
description: The Village - is a game that links some traditional occidental cultural's elements (classical music, poetry and myths) and standard 2D rpg features (mainly influenced by SNES and PS1's 2D rpg). The story is about a young father (X) who looks for his daughter (Eve) in an unknown northern country. You'll have to conduct the investigation (exploring places and the villages, solving the riddles...) while improving your character (farming, crafting...) for escaping the shadows that are after you. This non violent game (there is not fights - only chases) is very suitable for children.
